page.title: 16LEISURE IN SANDY LANE
page.content: Sandy Lane has had a cricket club in the Bradford League for many years. There are two senior and two junior teams. They play in Greenwood Park. There are four football teams: under 17, under 15, under 12, and under 10. The Methodist cubs meet in the school every Tuesday. Guides meet in the school on Wednesday and Brownies meet in the Methodist church. The Adventurers club for 6 to 10 year olds meets at the Baptist church on Thursdays, youth club for over four years old meets on Fridays at the Methodist church. There is a riding stable at Mount Pleasant with about 15 horses for hire. Part of the West Bradford Golf Club above Chellow Dean is in this area. Bingo is played in the school every Monday.There are many allotment gardens in the area. Many people enjoy walking in Chellow Dean.
